mapper.select: select id, date_id, employee_id, order_complete_num, order_complete_price, invite_user_num, invite_user_price, positive_comment_bonus, negative_comment_forfeit, negative_comment_num, positive_comment_num, overtime_num, overtime_price, other_bonus, other_forfeit, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from employee_salary_dayrecord where date_id = #{dateId} and employee_id=#{employeeId}

date_id = #{dateId},
employee_id = #{employeeId},
order_complete_num = #{orderCompleteNum},

where id = #{id}
